content: **you ll love this beautifully textured dishcloth pattern quick & fun to make ** try the cottage comfort washcloth/dishcloth pattern this pattern is beginner-friendly and has a dreamy texture this pattern makes an excellent gift **pattern highlights** // add texture by working in front and back loops // written & video instructions included **sizes** 8 x 8 with instructions to increase the size **suggested yarn** hobby lobby i love this cotton and paintbox cotton aran **hooks used** i 9/5 5
